description:
Dive into the open world of the Car Parking Multiplayer with stunning sceneries and a variety of environments. Drive and race with your friends in cities, race tracks, deserts, off-roads, islands, and mountains. Explore the vast range of possibilities for car customization and tuning. Experience realistic driving physics and more than 130 car models with detailed interiors that are awaiting your creative and unique designs. 
Complete parking and racing levels and become a licensed, proficient driver. Customize your character with a variety of clothes and animations to use.  
All this and much more in Car Parking Multiplayer! 

Features: 
• Online Multiplayer Mode
• Seven different and unique locations
• More than 130 car models and 200+ body kits
• Advanced customization features for your livery and designs. 
• Realistic Driving Physics and Car Interiors
• Drag Racing and Chasing modes
• Character customization and expanded wardrobe 
• Variety of animations and emotions  
• Role Play: become a taxi or delivery driver and complete the orders 
• Police: catch and fine players for speeding
• Business: purchase and gain profit from multiple enterprises in different locations
name: Car Parking Multiplayer
